normalized: a fierce wind whirled up and blew away the subhumans from hell.

name: black
normalized: a little girl to assassinate me?
did asagi go mad or something?

name: black
normalized: can i at least ask your name?

name: black
normalized: the little girl from that time, huh?
a vortex of wind compressed to its utmost limit.
the super-vacuum blades that had been created by it attacked black.
black's body scattered in all directions before her eyes.
black's body had changed into a black mist.
in defiance of the raging wind, the dark mist, which had gathered together in its original shape, rushed towards asuka.
the mist of darkness easily eroded the defensive barrier of the wind god, and the next moment――
asuka's viewpoint sank with a thump.

name: asuka
normalized: （i didn't even understand what had happened.

name: asuka
normalized: （i was suddenly rolling on the ground, and there was a hot sensation in my extremities.

name: asuka
normalized: （it was only after i tried to stand up that i realized that my limbs were gone.
black was looking down at her.
with eyes like he was looking at a worm.
actually, she couldn't move, as if she had turned into a hornworm.
she just clumsily crept along the ground.
was the difference in power that great?
more even than the pain of both arms and legs having been cut off, she could not forgive herself for having been miserably defeated, without sinking her teeth into the enemy of her family at all.
she could do nothing but look up from the ground at her hated enemy.

name: black
normalized: the person who sacrificed herself to save your life at that time is weeping.
black, who heard that, made a face that seemed to want to say he had no interest in the life or death of an insect.

name: black
normalized: oboro, finish her by your hand.

name: oboro
normalized: i wonder if you know of me, hornworm-san?

name: oboro
normalized: i don't care about the name of a hornworm that's going to die.

name: asuka
normalized: （but, if i were killed by this person…）
without seeing a revolving lantern or anything, asuka was just staring at the claws that were going to take her life away.
the claw had been repelled by someone.
it's too early to choose death, asuka!

name: asuka
normalized: （after that, the sounds of an intense sword fight too.

name: masked taimanin
normalized: i will not let you kill this girl!

name: asuka
normalized: （all of a sudden, the person who appeared was fighting to protect me.

name: asuka
normalized: （that person lifted me in her arms.

name: masked taimanin
normalized: your duty is meant to be to restore the koukawa family!
and there was the maintenance room that she had gotten used to seeing.
asuka was sitting in her personal seat.
it looked like she had accidentally fallen asleep during maintenance.

name: kotani
normalized: it sounded like you were having a nightmare.
said kotani, who had woken asuka up by shaking her.
asuka answered, as if nothing had happened.
she didn't hear anything like 『did you have a bad dream or something?
nevertheless, on the other side of her smiling face, asuka felt a little down.
it was a dream she had seen repeatedly, time and again.
the nightmare that occurred 2 years ago.
she had not been able to set a hand or foot on black.
rather than just being defeated easily, she had lost hope and wished for her own death.

name: asuka
normalized: （i won't lose to black next time.
asuka, who tried to clench her fist, realized that her android arms ＆ legs had been changed from the ones for battle to the ones for everyday use.

name: asuka
normalized: you were working on replacing the parts to change their performance.
kotani tapped a finger on his wristwatch.
if she didn't leave immediately, she wouldn't be at school on time.

name: kotani
normalized: since you're taking it easy, i thought you were going to take the day off today as well.
she jumped up, with words like those from an old manga.
asuka had changed into her uniform, and cheerfully rushed out of the dso japan branch.
